00011 // project include files
00012 #include "filter.h"
00013 
00025 void Filter :: myfilter (double * coefficients, long order, double * signal, long N) {
00026     long i, j;
00027     double filtersum;
00028     for (i = 0; i < N; i ++)
00029     {
00030         filtersum = 0;
00031         for (j = -order; j <= order; j ++)
00032         {
00033             if (i + j >= 0 && i + j < N)
00034                 filtersum += coefficients [j + order] * signal [i + j];
00035         }
00036         signal [i] = filtersum;
00037     }
00038 }
